title: US, Iran to resume nuclear talks in Geneva on Thursday as military pressure mounts
summary_full: Iran and the US are set for a third round of nuclear talks in Geneva amid rising regional tensions. Washington is increasing its military presence and pressing Tehran for a swift deal, with President Trump issuing a 10-15 day ultimatum. Iran has warned of retaliation against US forces and facilities in the region if attacked.
